LanguageData.PlantAgave.label: agave
LanguageData.PlantAgave.description: A large-leafed desert plant with edible flowers and stalks.
LanguageData.PlantPincushionCactus.label: pincushion cactus
LanguageData.PlantPincushionCactus.description: A short cactus. So named because it resembles a pincushion.
LanguageData.PlantSaguaroCactus.label: saguaro cactus
LanguageData.PlantSaguaroCactus.description: A large cactus native to arid Earth environments.
LanguageData.PlantTreeDrago.label: drago tree
LanguageData.PlantTreeDrago.description: A hardy desert tree topped with thick, pointed leaves.
